title: Lemon-Parmesan Chicken Pasta (Pan Sauce)
summary: Quick stovetop pasta using pasta water, lemon juice, and Parmesan.

steps.text: Season and sear chicken in olive oil until cooked through; rest and slice.
Deglaze pan with pasta water and lemon juice, scraping browned bits.
Off heat, whisk in Parmesan to emulsify into a glossy sauce.
Toss in cooked pasta and sliced chicken; adjust with more pasta water as needed.
Season with salt and pepper; serve immediately.

warnings: Cook chicken to an internal temperature of 165°F (74°C).
